supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_01]: "Logging my time at the end of the day takes way too long. I have to click through so many screens just to add time for one project task. It's easily 10-15 minutes wasted."
[FDBK_07]: "Making corrections is a nightmare. If I accidentally submit my timesheet before it's complete, getting it back, editing it, and resubmitting involves way too many steps and approvals."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need a more streamlined and efficient time entry process with fewer steps and easier editing capabilities.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_03]: "I travel a lot for client meetings. It's impossible to log time easily when I'm not at my desk. I wish I could just quickly add entries from my phone right after a meeting."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need mobile access to log time conveniently when away from their desks.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_04]: "The system becomes incredibly slow, almost unusable, late in the afternoon, especially on Thursdays and Fridays. Trying to submit my timesheet before leaving is frustrating."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need a system with consistent performance, especially during peak usage times.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_08]: "The dropdown list for project codes is massive and in a random order. Finding the right code takes ages, and I've picked the wrong one by mistake more than once because I was rushing."
[FDBK_10]: "Sometimes the project codes I need aren't even in the system yet, especially for new projects. I have to chase finance to get them added."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need better project code management including searchable/sorted lists and timely code availability.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_05]: "Why can't I easily see a summary of my hours for the week broken down by project? I need this for my own records, but the portal doesn't offer a simple view like that. Generating reports seems impossible for regular users."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need better visibility into their time data with easy-to-access summaries and reports.

task_2_survey_design.survey_goal: To gather specific information about user pain points with the current NovaTime portal and prioritize potential improvements to enhance usability and efficiency.

survey_questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the current time entry process in NovaTime? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
survey_questions.purpose: To measure overall satisfaction with the current time entry workflow.

survey_questions.question_text: Which aspects of the current NovaTime portal do you find most frustrating? (Select all that apply)
survey_questions.purpose: To identify the most common pain points users experience with the current system.

survey_questions.question_text: How often do you need to log time when away from your desk?
survey_questions.purpose: To assess the need for mobile access capabilities.

survey_questions.question_text: What additional reporting features would be most valuable to you? (Select all that apply)
options: Comparison of logged time vs. planned time
survey_questions.purpose: To understand which reporting features users would find most useful.

survey_questions.question_text: If we could improve one aspect of the project code selection process, what would you prioritize?
options: Faster addition of new project codes
Reduced number of clicks to select codes
survey_questions.purpose: To identify the most important improvement needed for project code management.

survey_questions.question_text: Please describe any specific challenges you face when correcting or modifying submitted time entries.
survey_questions.purpose: To gather qualitative data about problems with the correction process.

survey_questions.question_text: What time-saving features would make the NovaTime portal more efficient for your daily use?
survey_questions.purpose: To collect user suggestions for efficiency improvements.
